oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Estes Kefauver Assumes The Role of a Pet Coon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This political ad was placed in Memphis newspapers by Edward H. Crump who was suggesting that Estes Kefauver was a raccon-like instrument of the communists.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Edward H. Crump campaign
